1010011011001000 0010101000110010 0 -> sum: 1101000011111010, cout: 0
1010010110100010 1001011011000010 0 -> sum: 0011110001100100, cout: 1
1011011100111011 1001001000000100 1 -> sum: 0100100101000000, cout: 1

0011010110101010 1010101010100011 1 -> sum: 1110000001001110, cout: 0
0110010101011010 0001010101110011 0 -> sum: 0111101011001101, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
